ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi's response to a very well thought out post
ygData.msgSnippet: funny you should say that, seems like with my necro the only groups that i find are xp groups (unless its with guildies or raids)... however going deep in
ygData.messageBody:
funny you should say that, seems like with my necro the only groups that i
find are xp groups (unless its with guildies or raids)... however going deep
in dungeons i rarely... unless its afterwards to do a CR by summoning their
butts to the zone. Its another reason why i play my bard again... that and i
was sick of running for hours to go from point A to B in Kunark with jboots.
Bard does it in minutes and funny enough, even though i feel my role is
limited in the group as a bard, i feel more appreciated and have more fun
cause i can actually see my xp move unlike 51+ levels. its pretty sad when
people you know have made new words for xp...

Previously people would say Ding! (meaning level)
but now there's :
Sling (Sliver of xp moved)
Bing (bubble of xp filled)

sad i tell ya

/rude

Rakka 52 necro
Minkin 39 bard
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Stephane Lange [mailto:slange@...]
Sent: September 14, 2000 1:43 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi's response to a very well thought out post

I am just talking about the class i, itself ;)

Even a necro with full of friend will be able to find a group quickly :)))
